name: Maijie Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Shouyang Luyang Maijie Coal Industry Company

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Maijie_Coal_Mine. The Maijie Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Rongjiagou, in the town of Jiecou, Shouyang County, Jinzhong City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Shouyang Luyang Maijie Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is fully owned by Shanxi Shouyang Luyang Maijie Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Lu'an Chemical Group.
